Description: The following switch statement is missing a default case: switch (Action) {                         case ActionType.Start:                             StartService(serviceController);                             break;                         case ActionType.Pause:                             PauseService(serviceController);                             break;                         case ActionType.Continue:                             ContinueService(serviceController);                             break;                         case ActionType.Stop:                             StopService(serviceController);                             break;                         case ActionType.Restart:                             RestartService(serviceController);                             break;                     }
